item.title: The Forging Of The Sadvipra 1
item.description: [[sadvipra]] The first level of the Tantra aspirant is that of an animal. The Hitopadesha explains this state saying, Áhára nidrá bhaya maethunaiṋca sámányametad pashubhiirnaránám;

item.title: The Forging Of The Sadvipra 2
item.description: [[sadvipra]] With the attainment of the status of a viira, Tantra begins to blossom in one’s life. To become a hero means to become a leader through dedication, sincerity, ideological zeal, fighting spirit and all-round capacity.
